column5: a man (*whom if the source is to be taken literally was taking a leak) by a canal in Sangkat Chreav
column7: spotted some baby crocodiles in the water. He reported them to the police
column8: who launched a search and caught five specimens.------The Fisheries Administration said that one croc had died
column9: and the others were handed over to a professional wildlife officer. ------AREY NEWS------*The crocodiles could have escaped from a farm
